featured.text: As such, the dot signifies piety and serves as a constant reminder to keep God in the front of a believer’s thoughts.

definition.zh_def: 虔誠，對宗教或道德信仰的忠誠和尊重。
definition.en_def: The quality of being religious or reverent.
definition.example: Her piety was evident in her daily prayers and charitable acts.
